meanings.definition: To increase in size or scale.
meanings.sent1: She is upsizing her wardrobe to fit all her new clothes.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to start upsizing their production to meet the growing demand.
meanings.sent3: The balloon kept upsizing until it popped with a loud bang.
meanings.sent4: His excitement was upsizing with each passing minute.
meanings.sent5: The cake batter was upsizing in the oven, creating a deliciously fluffy dessert.

meanings.definition: The act of making something larger or bigger.
meanings.sent1: The upsizing of the house required additional construction work.
meanings.sent2: We are considering an upsizing of our computer system to handle more data.
meanings.sent3: The upsizing of the ice cream cone made it impossible to eat without making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The upsizing of the city skyline was a testament to its rapid growth.
meanings.sent5: The upsizing of the family car allowed for more comfortable road trips.
